submission:
class Solution:
    def numberOfAlternatingGroups(self, colors: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        ind0 = 0
        ind1 = 1
        c = 0
        while ind0 < len(colors) and ind1 < len(colors) + k:
            ind = ind1 % len(colors)
            while colors[ind] != colors[ind - 1] and (ind1 < (len(colors) + k - 1)):
                ind1 += 1
                ind = ind1 % len(colors)
            c += max(ind1 - ind0 - k + 1, 0)
            ind0 = ind1
            ind1 = ind0 + 1
        return c
